Description:
Set in a charming building with a terrace, Cinque Colori offers rooms with free Wi-Fi overlooking the sea. Breakfast is provided. Algarrobo town and beaches are 3 km away. Free parking is provided.

Decorated with exposed brick walls, rooms at Cinque Colori feature either private balconies or terraces with sea views. All of them have private bathrooms, and heating during the winter season.

A continental breakfast with pastries and jams is served daily.

Guests can relax on the terrace enjoying panoramic sea views. Algarrobo Norte Beach is 500 metres away.

Cinque Colori is 72 km from Valparaiso and 100 km from Santiago. Arturo Merino Benitez Airport is 85 km away. Please inform Cinque Colori Bed & Breakfast- Spa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at La Mirage Parador in Algarrobo, you'll be 3.2 mi (5.1 km) from Tunquen Beach and 13.4 mi (21.6 km) from Kingston Family Vineyards. This hotel is 13.9 mi (22.4 km) from Casas del Bosque Winery and 14.7 mi (23.7 km) from Quintay Cove.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 5 guestrooms. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy international cuisine at Summer Restaurant Nov-Mar, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 9:00 AM to 11 AM.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Located in Algarrobo, 200 metres from Playa San Pedro, Winery Hotel Boutique provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 200 metres from Los Tubos and around 300 metres from Playa Pejerrey. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace and others also offer sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Winery Hotel Boutique.

Isla Negra House is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 101 km from Winery Hotel Boutique. Guests need to meet one or more requirements to stay in this property: proof of full Coronavirus (Covid-19) vaccination, a recent valid negative Coronavirus PCR test, or recent proof of Coronavirus recovery.
A damage deposit of USD 140 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Located 200 metres from Algarrobo beach and from the gastronomic area, Hotel Pacifico offers free Wi-Fi and breakfast in Algarrobo. An outdoor swimming pool and on-site restaurant are featured.

The rooms in Hotel Pacifico offer private bathrooms and cable TVs.

Guests can order snacks at the bar or relax in the game room. 24-hour front desk assistance is provided.

Hotel Pacifico is 1 km from the bus station and 96 km from Comodoro Arturo Merino Benítez international airport. Free private parking is possible on site. Please inform Hotel Pacifico in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
LOCAL TAX LAW

This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the hotel rates and must be paid separately.

To be exempt from this 19% additional fee (IVA) the payment must be made in US dollars and a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented. The passenger wont be exempt from this fee when paying in local currency. In case of no show the invoice will be billed in local currency, including this additional fee (IVA).

Description:
Featuring an outdoor and an indoor pool, San Alfonso del Mar - Goleta offers self-catering apartments in Algarrobo. Free WiFi access is available here and guests can enjoy a great ocean view.

Apartments at San Alfonso del Mar - Goleta are equipped with a private bathroom, cable TV, a fully-equipped kitchen and a balcony overlooking the pool and the ocean.

At San Alfonso del Mar - Goleta guests will find a spa and wellness centre and a restaurant. Water sport facilities are offered onsite. Guests can enjoy activities in the surrounding area, such as windsurfing, diving and snorkelling. The property offers free parking.

San Alfonso del Mar - Goleta is located 35 km from Casablanca Valley Vineyards and 110 km from Santiago.  A damage deposit of USD 200 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please inform San Alfonso del Mar, Goleta in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Swimming is not allowed except in a very small area next to the lagoon and during summer high season only (approx. December 15 to March 15)
The on-site restaurants are open only during weekends and Chilean holiday periods outside of summer high season.

Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, Condominio La Marina de Algarrobo offers accommodations in Algarrobo.

The three-bedroom townhouse is located in a guard-gated community, offering 24 hour surveillance. It is fitted with heating, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a fully-equipped kitchenette, including a microwave and an oven. A magnificent view of the ocean can be enjoyed from the rooms.

At Condominio La Marina de Algarrobo guests will find a communal sauna, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include laundry and barbecue facilities.

The property is located only a 5-minute drive from the bus station of Algarrobo. It is a 10-minute walk from El Canelo and Los Tubos de Algarrobo beaches and from the Yacht Club. San Alfonso del Mar is 3.3 km from the property and Santiago International Airport is 82 km away. Free parking is available for guests. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Condominio La Marina de Algarrobo in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
All Chilean citizens, resident foreigners and foreigners must pay an additional fee (IVA) of 19%. Rates and additional fees must be paid in local currency.
This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the hotel rates.
HotelFacilities: Free self parking Sauna Garden Terrace Laundry facilities BBQ facilities Heating Outdoor pool Parking onsite Private parking

Description:
Set in Algarrobo, 48 km from Arauco Premium Outlet Curauma, Algarrobo Propiedades Cabañas - Suite features accommodation with free WiFi.

Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with garden views.

A bicycle rental service is available at the holiday home.

The nearest airport is Santiago International, 98 km from Algarrobo Propiedades Cabañas - Sui, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Algarrobo Propiedades Cabañas - Suite in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Based on local tax laws, Chilean citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Chile) must pay an additional fee of 19%.

Please note that for tax exemption travellers must pay in US dollars and have to present the migration card they are given when they arrive to the country.

Foreign business travellers, who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 19% regardless of the length of their stay in Chile. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation. The hotel will contact you after booking to provide bank wire instructions.

Please note, the bungalows are only equipped for serving breakfast or cold foods.

Note that during Spring and Summer, the heating service is not included in the rate. During these months, guests can request the service but for an extra fee.
HotelFacilities: Free self parking Garden Non-smoking rooms Airport shuttle Laundry facilities Family rooms Internet access Windsurfing Bicycle rental (additional charge) Heating Free WiFi Free WiFi Airport transportation (surcharge) Parking onsite Private parking

Description:
An outdoor swimming pool can be enjoyed in these fully furnished bungalows 2 km off downtown Algarrobo. Las Cadenas Beach is 2 km away and Algarrobo Norte Beach is 1.5 km from the bungalows.

Turismo Pao-Pao has comfortable bungalows surrounded by garden and equipped with kitchen facilities, TVs, and private bathrooms with showers.

Private parking is free and the bus station is 6 km from Pao-Pao bungalows. Please inform Pao Pao Lodge Algarrobo in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Based on local tax laws, Chilean citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Chile) must pay an additional fee of 19%.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice will also be charged the additional 19%, regardless of the length of their stay in Chile.

This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Surrounded by beautiful forests and featuring a large garden, Cabañas VanPer offers self-catering bungalow accommodations located in Algarrobo.

These fully-furnished bungalows have an innovative design and are nicely fitted with a sofa, a private bathroom, a dining area, a fully-equipped kitchen and a balcony with a great garden view. Bed linen is included.

At Cabañas VanPer guests are welcome to use the shared barbecue facilities. Additionally the property offers 2 free parking spots per bungalow.

Santiago International Airport is located 83 km from the property. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Cabañas VanPer in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set 48 km from Arauco Premium Outlet Curauma, Cabañas & Club Montañita offers accommodation with a terrace, as well as an outdoor swimming pool.

All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen. A patio with pool views is offered in every unit.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 94 km from the property.
HotelFacilities: Free self parking Sauna Garden Terrace Non-smoking rooms Family rooms Hot tub/jacuzzi Outdoor pool Parking onsite Private parking

Description:
Offering an outdoor pool surrounded by gardens in Algarrobo, Cabañas La Querencia de Algarrobo comprises self-catering bungalows. Banks and supermarkets are found a 5-minute drive away, in the commercial area. Guests can travel to Cerro Alegre Hill which is 37 km away.

The bedrooms here have a smart countryside style, with wooden features. Each bungalow comes with a private bathroom, a kitchen with dining area, satellite TV and a terrace.

At Cabañas La Querencia de Algarrobo you will find a lush and spacious garden.

The city of Valparaiso and Casablanca Valley are both a 25-minute drive away. Cabañas La Querencia de Algarrobo is 78 km from Arturo Merino Benitez International Airport and a 10-minute drive from El Litre bus station. Free parking is possible here. Please inform Cabañas La Querencia de Algarrobo in advance of your expected arrival time. Some of the units have a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A terrace is available for guests at the lodge to use.

Description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, Kai Bed and Breakfast is a boutique hotel in Algarrobo, only 90 km from Santiago. Free WiFi access is provided on site.

Guests are served a complimentary breakfast daily.

Each room at Kai Bed and Breakfast features a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a safety deposit box.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play billiards at Kai Bed and Breakfast. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 92 km from the property. Description:
Property Location
Located in Algarrobo, this vacation home is within a 15-minute drive of Algarrobo Municipal Stadium and Canelo Beach. This vacation home is 6.7 mi (10.8 km) from Pena Blanca and 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Pablo Neruda Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself comfortable in this vacation home, featuring a kitchen with a refrigerator and an oven. There's a private furnished balcony/patio. Cable programming along with a DVD player are provided for your entertainment. A private bathroom has a deep soaking tub and complimentary toiletries.

Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Located in Algarrobo, Lezaeta Bed and Breakfast offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a garden and a shared lounge.

There is a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries in each unit, along with a hairdryer.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a à la carte or a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Lezaeta Bed and Breakfast include Playa Internacional, Las Cadenas and Playa Pejerrey. The nearest airport is Santiago International, 101 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Lezaeta Bed and Breakfast in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Set in Algarrobo, 46 km from Arauco Premium Outlet Curauma, Hostal La Candelaria offers accommodation with free WiFi.

A terrace with sea views is offered in each unit.

A continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.

The bed and breakfast offers a barbecue.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 97 km from Hostal La Candelaria.

Address: Fundo La Boca Los Quebrachos 1C Tunquen
Description:
Tunquen Magico provides beachfront accommodation in Tunquen. Among the various facilities are barbecue facilities, a garden, as well as a terrace. Guests can enjoy sea views. We have high speed satellite internet.

At the Tunquen Magico, each room comes with a wardrobe, a private bathroom.

Fishing and hiking are among the activities that guests of the accommodation can find nearby.

Viña del Mar is 30 km from Tunquen Magico, while Valparaíso is 26 km from the property. Santiago International Airport is 83 km away. Please inform Tunquen Magico in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Algarrobo Apart Hotel & Spa is located in a secure quiet area of Algarrobo that will guarantee a good rest for everyone. Close to super markets and a few stores, the Apart Hotel is also well connected to the rest of the town and only 10-minute away from the beach by foot.

The property offers self-catering apartments with Wi Fi throughout the building, a microwave, refrigerator, dining and sitting area, and satellite TV. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available for an extra fee while free private parking is possible on site.

Guest will have the opportunity to use for a surcharge the SPA facilities available at the property along with the heated indoor swimming pool. Guest can also arrange massage and Reiki sessions.

Some of the popular activities in the area are diving, sailing, and snorkelling. There is a golf course within 3 km.  Arturo Merino Benitez airport is a 1-hour drive away. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Algarrobo Apart Hotel & Spa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of USD 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note from December 15 to March 30 the check in will be until 23hrs.

Please note various services are available at the property for a surcharge (swimming pool, hot-tub, massages, breakfast). To know more about the details please contact the property directly.


LOCAL TAX LAW

Based on local tax laws, all Chilean citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (IVA) of 19%. This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the hotel rates and must be paid separately. To be exempt from this 19% additional fee (IVA) the payment must be made in US dollars and a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented. The passenger wont be exempt from this fee when paying in local currency. In case of no show the invoice will be billed in local currency, including this additional fee (IVA).

Description:
Offering free WiFi and a terrace, Cabañas Orimatila offers accommodation in Algarrobo, only a 5-minute walk from the beach.

Here guests will find apartment and bungalow accommodations. They are all fully-furnished and equipped with a TV with cable channels. In addition, the 8 person bungalow has a private pool.

Cabañas Orimatila offers free private parking available on site and free use of bicycles. Both these amenities are subject to availability.

This property is located only 1 km from San Alfonso del Mar. The nearest airport is Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, 80 km from Cabañas Orimatila. Please inform Cabañas Orimatila in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note the property requires a deposit of 50% of the total amount for reservations for January and February. In addition, the for reservations during these 2 months, the property will only accept a minimum 7 night stay.

Description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace, Condominio San Alfonso Del Mar - Vista Inmejorable is situated in the San Alfonso del Mar district of Algarrobo, only 1.1 km from Playa Internacional. Located on the beachfront, this property features a restaurant, a bar, water sports facilities and free WiFi.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. The apartment also features 2 bathrooms with a bath.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Spanish.

The apartment offers a childrens playground. Windsurfing and fishing are possible within the area, and Condominio San Alfonso Del Mar - Vista Inmejorable offers a private beach area.

Las Cadenas is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Playa Algarrobo Norte is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 102 km from Condominio San Alfonso Del Mar - Vista Inmejorable. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Address: Av. Canelo 100 Condominio Pinares Del Canelillo
Description:
Offering an incredible ocean and garden view, Departamento en la Playa is a self-catering accommodation in Algarrobo. The property is located 50 metres from the beachfront.

This fully-furnished apartment is on the ground floor of the building and is fitted with a balcony with a fantastic ocean view, heating, a sofa, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a dining area. A fully-equipped kitchen is available.

The building features top-grade facilities including 3 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, an elevator, a tennis court and a games room including table tennis. Barbecue facilities, a fitness centre and a communal terrace are also available. Snorkeling lessons may be requested for an extra fee.

Departamento en la Playa is located a 2-hour drive from Merino Benitez International Airport in Santiago. Private parking is available free of charge. Please inform Departamento en la Playa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

HotelName: San Alfonso Del Mar Algarrobo Fragata
Description:
Set in Algarrobo, just 50 metres from Playa Internacional, San Alfonso del Mar Algarrobo Fragata offers beachfront accommodation with a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a bar and free WiFi. This apartment features a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with lake views.

The apartment has both a childrens playground and a barbecue, along with a private beach area and water sports facilities.

Playa Algarrobo Norte is 1 km from San Alfonso del Mar Algarrobo Fraga, while Las Cadenas is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 98 km from the accommodation. Address: Mar Rojo 127 Condominio Puerta Del Mar Algarrobo
Description:
Situated in a luxurious condominium next to an accessible forest, Eco Casa Good Vibrations offers accommodation for up to 10 guests in Algarrobo, only 6 km from San Alfonso del Mar. There is 24-hour security at the condominium.

The condominium is a sustainable and eco-friendly property, which features a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court, a football pitch, a clubhouse, amongst others. Free private parking is available on site.

This holiday home features a dining area, a fully-equipped kitchen, private bathroom facilities, and a terrace on the upper level, great for sunbathing or stargazing. This holiday home also includes a flat-screen TV and DVD player.

Guests can request extra services for a surcharge, including a daily cleaning service, and different tours to enjoy the area.
It has access to the highway which connects to the beach in only 5 minutes, 15 minutes from Casablanca Vineyards, and only 100 km from Santiago. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 90.5 km from Eco Casa Good Vibrations. Please inform Eco Casa Good Vibrations in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Piscina Club House is closed from Mon 02 Mar 2020 until Sun 13 Dec 2020

Address: Camino Algarrobo Mirasol N 560 San Alfonso Del Mar
Description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace, Condominio San Alfonso Del Mar - Vista Inmejorable is situated in the San Alfonso del Mar district of Algarrobo, only 1.1 km from Playa Internacional. Featuring free private parking, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as windsurfing and fishing.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. The apartment also includes 2 bathrooms with a bath.

Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

The apartment has both a childrens playground and a barbecue, along with a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area.

Las Cadenas is 1.6 km from Condominio San Alfonso Del Mar - Vista Inmejorable, while Playa Algarrobo Norte is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 102 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Penguin Island

Location : When you stay at this condo in Algarrobo, you ll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Penguin Island and Algarrobo Municipal Stadium. This beach condo is 22.3 mi (35.9 km) from San Antonio Port and 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Playa Algarrobo.

Rooms : Make yourself comfortable in this condo, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. There s a private balcony. A flat-screen television with cable programming provides entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a microwave, and housekeeping is provided once per stay.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards

Special Instructions : There is no front desk at this property. This property doesn t offer after-hours check-in. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions.

Address: Avenida Parque Norte 350 Condominio Laguna Bahia Edificio Mar # 1103
Description:
Boasting pool views, Laguna Bahía, Algarrobo features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar, around 2.2 km from Playa Internacional. This apartment has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

Featuring a terrace and sea views, the apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room, satellite flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a bath. The property also has 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer.

Staff at the apartment are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk.

Laguna Bahía, Algarrobo offers a childrens playground. Hiking and cycling are possible within the area, and the accommodation offers a private beach area.

Las Cadenas is 2.7 km from Laguna Bahía, Algarrobo, while Playa Algarrobo Norte is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 103 km from the apartment. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
